actions.text: Introduced in the Senate. Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.
Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 226.

official_title: A bill to permit the Oakwood Child Development Center, Inc. to use funds received under a grant made under the Community Services Block Grant for certain services for senior citizens, and for other purposes.
subjects: Day care centers for the aged

summary.text: Allows the use of Oakwood Child Development Center, Inc., of Los Angeles, California, to use funds received under a grant made under the Community Services Block Grant Act for certain services for senior citizens.

titles.title: A bill to permit the Oakwood Child Development Center, Inc. to use funds received under a grant made under the Community Services Block Grant for certain services for senior citizens, and for other purposes.
